com.gemalto.idp.mobile.suite

Class MobileSuiteException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.suite.MobileSuiteException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MobileSuiteException
extends java.lang.Exception
    There is only one exception class in this suite SDK. The number of error code is reduced and the original error code is embedded into Message
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • OTP_SETTINGS_NOT_FOUND

        public static final int OTP_SETTINGS_NOT_FOUND
        OTP Settings not found. If OTP has been provisioned previously using IDP Mobile SDK, please invoke any of the following APIs
        • OathMobileProtector.persistDcvvSettings(String, DcvvSettings)
        • OathMobileProtector.persistHotpSettings(String, HotpSettings)
        • OathMobileProtector.persistOcraSettings(String, OcraSettings)
        • OathMobileProtector.persistTotpSettings(String, TotpSettings)
        • CapMobileProtector.persistCapSettings(String, CapSettings)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIO_FINGERPRINT_NOT_CONFIGURED

        public static final int BIO_FINGERPRINT_NOT_CONFIGURED
        BioFingerprint is not enrolled on the device.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MESSENGER_INVALID_REGISTRATION_CODE

        public static final int MESSENGER_INVALID_REGISTRATION_CODE
        Messenger Operation failed. It can be caused by:
        • Registration to the OOB server failed: The registration code is not valid for the user ID.
        • Registration to the OOB server failed: The registration process expired.

        Client application actions:

        • Display error message.
        • For registration code is not valid, Instruct end user to check his/her registration code and try again (note there may be limited number of attempts). Instruct end user, if the problem persists, to contact his/her customer care to check the validity of his/her registration code.
        • For registration code expired, Instruct end user to contact his/her customer care to re-initialize the registration process.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MESSENGER_INVALID_REQUEST_PARAMETER

        public static final int MESSENGER_INVALID_REQUEST_PARAMETER
        Messenger Operation failed. It can be caused by:
        • Invalid public key that can be cause by invalid encoding, wrong length, wrong key usage, etc.
        • Client id that send to the server is invalid or has not yet been registered.
        • Specified domain name is invalid
        • Specified application id is invalid
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MESSENGER_NETWORK_FAILURE

        public static final int MESSENGER_NETWORK_FAILURE
        OOB reported error due to the communication issue.
        • The device is not connected to the network or connection is poor.
        • Issue associated with client-server configuration such as server certificate.
        • The service is not available, server is down.

        Application developer actions:

        • Ensure network connection available.
        • Ensure OOB server is up and running.
        Client application actions:
        • Display error message.
        • Instruct end user to enable some network connection (WiFi, GSM Data, ...), wait it to become really connected and repeat the operation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRANSACTION_SIGNING_INVALID_DATA

        public static final int TRANSACTION_SIGNING_INVALID_DATA
        Messenger Operation failure related to Transaction Signing due to invalid data either on request or response. It can be caused by:
        • Bad frame data
        • Not supported frame
        • Not supported device
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRANSACTION_SIGNING_INVALID_SIGNATURE

        public static final int TRANSACTION_SIGNING_INVALID_SIGNATURE
        Messenger Operation failure related to Transaction Signing due to invalid signature. Check the value being passed when calling MobileSuite.Builder.withMspVerificationKeys(List)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TRANSACTION_SIGNING_DEOBFUSCATION_FAILURE

        public static final int TRANSACTION_SIGNING_DEOBFUSCATION_FAILURE
        Messenger Operation failure related to Transaction Signing due to failure on obfuscation Check the value being passed when calling MobileSuite.Builder.withMspObfuscationKeys(List)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        code - The error code.
        cause - The nested exception causing this exception.
        message - The message following String.format(Locale, String, Object...) } syntax.
        args - The optional formatting arguments.
